ui.MK2_dust_collector_desc: Collects Whale Dust from Whales at a faster rate
ui.advanced_acid_umbrella_desc: Provides 5 damage reduction in acid rain.
ui.advanced_radioactive_umbrella_desc: Provides 5 damage reduction in radioactive snow.
ui.basic_acid_umbrella_desc: Provides 1 damage reduction in acid rain.
ui.basic_radioactive_umbrella_desc: Provides 1 damage reduction in radioactive snow.
ui.basic_umbrella_desc: 1 damage reduction in a weather event.
ui.better_syringe_desc: Healer clones heal by 6 more each time.
ui.building_locked_body: You need to unlock this building first
ui.cat_ninja_paw_holders_desc: 30% chance to dodge damage in weather events.
ui.cat_whiskers_desc: 10% chance to dodge damage in weather events.
ui.chip_100_tooltip_body:
Gather 100 circuitry chips.
And no, there isn't.
ui.chip_10_tooltip_body:
Gather 10 circuitry chips.
Congratulations. You've beat the game.
ui.chip_500_tooltip_body:
Gather 500 circuitry chips.
I trust nobody will get this far.
ui.chip_500_tooltip_title: Ascended Supernatural Venerable Master of the Chip-Fu Universe
ui.colonist_home_tooltip_body:
This is a colonist home.
It houses a single colonist and
provides 5 gold per day.
ui.colonist_tooltip_body:
A normal colonist.
Able to be cheaply cloned.
They serve no function.
Game over if all of them die.
ui.converter_locked_body: You need to unlock this converter first
ui.crystal_500_tooltip_title: I See Things In the Shiny
ui.crystal_to_wafer_converter_description: Converts Crystals into Wafers at a rate of 10:1
ui.cushionista_desc: New Damage Cushion clones get +30 HP.
ui.damage_cushion_tooltip_body:
This is a damage cushion clone.
It has a higher chance to be hit during weather events.
Boasts a lot of HP, but they cost 4 gold per day to maintain.
ui.duplicator_tooltip_body:
This is a duplicator.
It duplicates a colonist, but at a cost!
ui.dust_to_crystal_converter_description: Converts Whale Dust into Crystals at a rate of 10:1
ui.first_chip_tooltip_body:
Gather your first chip 
(*whipser* They are only in the game because of the game jam theme).
ui.first_crystal_to_wafer_converter_tooltip: Build your first crystal to wafer converter.
ui.first_dust_collector_tooltip_body: Build your very first dust collector.
ui.first_song_gatherer_tooltip_body: Build your very first whale song gatherer.
ui.first_wafer_to_chip_converter_tooltip_bo: Build your first wafer to chip converter.
ui.gold_digger_tooltip_body:
This is a gold digger clone.
It collects gold from the ground.
It is very fragile and ndies easily.
ui.gold_lover_desc: Doubles gold produced at the end of the day.
ui.golden_pickaxe_desc: Gold Digger clones dig 4 more gold each time they dig.
ui.grav_wave_desc:
The black hole is unstable!
At regular intervals, it emits gravitational waves
that jostle any whales nearby.
ui.healer_tooltip_body:
This is a healer clone.
It heals colonists who are hurt.
It costs 3 gold per day to maintain.
ui.karma_umbrella_desc: On taking damage, heals a random colonist for 3 HP.
ui.levelup_physique_desc: +2 Physique • Big health bump and regen
ui.main_menu_tooltip_body: Spend more than three minutes in the main menu.
ui.middling_acid_umbrella_desc: Provides 3 damage reduction in acid rain.
ui.middling_radioactive_umbrella_desc: Provides 3 damage reduction in radioactive snow.
ui.plastic_syringe_desc: Healer clones heal by 3 more each time.
ui.plutonium_syringe_desc: Healer clones heal by 9 more each time.
ui.safety_umbrella_desc: New Damage Cushion clones get +10 HP.
ui.shoddy_pickaxe_desc: Gold Digger clones dig 1 more gold each time they dig.
ui.space_krill_body:
These little guys are your automated workers.
They will do the dirty work and bug the whale for you.
All you have to do then is pick the dust up afterward.
ui.steel_umbrella_desc: New Damage Cushion clones get +15 HP.
ui.tip_body: Stuck? The basic mechanic is to click the whale.
ui.tip_body_2: You can place krill homes to automate clicking.
ui.tip_body_3: You can buy buildings to automatically collect resources.
ui.tip_body_4:
You can also convert resources into other resources
when you unlock converters, on the right bottom menu.
ui.tip_body_5:
Try for the achievements in the game.
Hovering will tell you their requirements.
ui.tip_body_6: Biggest tip: Get as many buildings you can!
ui.tooltip_buy_menu_body:
This is where you can buy and place buildings.
Cycle through your options.
Not all of them will be available at the start.
Unlock new buildings by gathering more resources.
ui.tooltip_currency_chips:
The rarest resource.
Chips don't do anything (short jams, am I rite?)
but you can show off how many you made!
Don't tell the whale what you did.
ui.tooltip_currency_crystals:
Recently discovered resource.
It is a required component for chips
Crystals are created by collecting the energy of whale songs
ui.tooltip_currency_song_essence:
A new resource.
It is required to create chips.
Song Essence is collected from whales singing
though the exact mechanism is unknown.
ui.tooltip_currency_wafers:
A rare resource.
Wafers, along with song essence, are used to create chips.
ui.tooltip_currency_whale_dust:
The main resource in the game.
It is used to buy buildings and upgrades.
Space whales are the only konwn source of Whale Dust.
ui.tooltip_text:
This is a tooltip,
{text_type} text at
the moment
ui.tutorial_advanced:
As you progress, you will be able to buy
relics from the end-of-day shop.
They will help your colonists survive the
harsh weather. Note that the weather will
only get worse as you progress.
ui.tutorial_duplicate:
Hey there! Let me teach you the ropes with
a quick tutorial. Drag & drop a colonist
into the window on the left side to
duplicate it. This will spawn clones,
each with a specific function.
ui.tutorial_end:
That's it for the tutorial! Refer to the
tooltips if you need more info.
Good luck, and have fun! Let's see 'weather
or not' you can survive!
ui.tutorial_game_goal:
Your goal is to survive the acid rains and
radioactive snows by using the clones you
create. You must keep colonists alive, and
keep your gold balance above 0, to keep
playing. You may want to build some colonist
homes to help with gold production.
ui.ultimate_mark_of_the_cat_ninja_desc: 50% chance to dodge damage in weather events.
ui.ultimate_mark_of_the_cat_ninja_name: Ultimate Mark of the Cat Ninja
ui.useful_pickaxe_desc: Gold Digger clones dig 2 more gold each time they dig.
ui.vampire_teeth_desc: On taking damage, heals by 10% of damage taken.
ui.wafer_500_tooltip_title: Care for a Wafer? I've Got Many
ui.wafer_to_chip_converter_description: Converts Wafers + Song Essence into Chips at a rate of 10:1
ui.whale_body:
These space whales can sing! They are also the main source of Whale Dust.
Click to find out.
ui.whale_dust_1000_tooltip_body:
Gather 1000 whale dust.
Also, what have you done?
ui.whale_song_gatherer_desc:
Collects Whale Songs from Whales.
Produces a new resource: Song Essence,
which is required for creating chips

tag_master.name: Tag Master
tag_master.description: +1% Damage for every Tag you have.

elemental_master.name: Elemental Master
elemental_master.description: +5% Damage for every Elemental Tag (Fire, Ice, Lightning).

synergy_seeker.name: Synergy Seeker
synergy_seeker.description: Gain +10 Mana when a Set Bonus is active.

tag_specialist.name: Tag Specialist
tag_specialist.description: +30% damage if 3+ actions share the same tag.

rainbow_mage.name: Rainbow Mage
rainbow_mage.description: +10% damage per distinct tag type in cast.

combo_catalyst.name: Combo Catalyst
combo_catalyst.description: Single actions with 2+ tags cast twice.

flame_ward.name: Flame Ward
flame_ward.description: Immune to Fire damage from projectiles.

thorns.name: Thorns
thorns.description: Reflect 50% of projectile damage back to attacker.

survival_instinct.name: Survival Instinct
survival_instinct.description: +20% damage for 3s after taking projectile damage.

wildfire.name: Avatar of Wildfire
wildfire.effect: Multicast modifiers now Loop the cast block instead of simultaneous cast.

citadel.name: Avatar of the Citadel
citadel.effect: Summons inherit 100% of your Block Chance and Thorns.

miasma.name: Avatar of Miasma
miasma.effect: Wands triggered by Movement now trigger 'On Hit' effects.

stormlord.name: Avatar of the Storm
stormlord.effect: Critical hits always Chain to a nearby enemy.

voidwalker.name: Voidwalker
voidwalker.effect: When you cast a projectile, your Summons also cast a copy of it.

bloodgod.name: Blood God
bloodgod.effect: Gain +1% Damage for every 1% missing HP.

ember_nomad.name: Ember Nomad
ember_nomad.description: A wanderer from the scorched wastes.

glacier_litany.name: Glacier Litany
glacier_litany.description: Freeze nearby enemies and gain barrier. Cooldown reduced when you block.

contagion.name: Contagion
contagion.description: Spread all poison stacks to nearby enemies.

void_rift.name: Void Rift
void_rift.description: Summon a rift that pulls enemies and deals damage.

arcane.name: Arcane Discipline
arcane.description: Mastery of pure magic and spell manipulation.

trigger.timer: Casts spells automatically every few seconds.
trigger.collision: Casts spells when you collide with an enemy.
trigger.distance: Casts spells after traveling a certain distance.

lightning_rod.name: Lightning Rod
lightning_rod.description: +15 Damage to Lightning spells. Critical hits chain to one extra enemy.

conductor.name: The Conductor
conductor.description: Chain lightning applies Static Charge. Mark detonations chain to other marked enemies.

storm_battery.name: Storm Battery
storm_battery.description: +5% lightning damage per Static Charge stack on any enemy.

arc_reactor.name: Arc Reactor
arc_reactor.description: Electrocute heals you for 2 HP per tick.

stormlord.name: Avatar of the Storm
stormlord.effect: Critical hits always Chain to a nearby enemy. Chain effects apply Static Charge.

conduit.name: Avatar of the Conduit
conduit.description: Pain becomes power. Lightning becomes you.
conduit.effect: +30% Lightning Resistance and Damage. Physical damage taken becomes Conduit Charge.
